# Synkora Website Project

This is a modern, futuristic website for Synkora (Pty) Ltd - an AI, Digital Media and Data Solutions company.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML file
- `styles.css` - Main stylesheet with nude color theme
- `script.js` - JavaScript for interactions and animations
- `README.md` - Project documentation

## Design Guidelines
- Modern/futuristic aesthetic with nude color palette
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Smooth scrolling and animations
- Professional business presentation

Ready for GitHub Pages deployment from the main branch.
